thread.section_title: Anderson Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Anderson Carpet One Floor & Home | www.andersoncarpetone.com
thread.title: Carol
thread.title_full: Anderson Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Carol

author: Carol
title: Carol
text: Anderson's replaced all of the flooring in our home--an engineered flooring and wall to wall carpeting in the bedrooms. Their help in choosing the materials led us to products that are attractive, durable and well-priced. The installation was prompt, professional and well done. We highly recommend Anderson's for your next project.
